{% extends "_layouts/skeleton.html" %} {% set content %} # URL triggers There are a number of 'special' URL segments in Prontotype URLs that will trigger some specific behaviour - for instance pre-processing and serving up an [asset file]({{ pt.pages.getById('assets').getUrl() }}), triggering a [short URL redirect]({{ pt.pages.getById('pages-shorturls').getUrl() }}), and so on. All of these trigger segments have default values which can be overridden in your config files should you wish . To **disable** any of the special functionality triggered by these URLs, you can set the value of that trigger in your config file to `null`. Below is the default set of trigger values: 
triggers:
  data: _data
  shorturl: _p
{% if pt.pages.getById('tools') %}  tools: _tools{% endif %}
  auth: _auth
  assets: _assets
  files: _files
  user: _user
To read more about the functionality each of these triggers expose, see the relevant docs page: * `data`: [{{ pt.pages.getById('data').getTitle() }}]({{ pt.pages.getById('data').getUrl() }}) * `shorturl`: [{{ pt.pages.getById('pages-shorturls').getTitle() }}]({{ pt.pages.getById('pages-shorturls').getUrl() }}) {% if pt.pages.getById('tools') %}* `tools`: [{{ pt.pages.getById('tools').getTitle() }}]({{ pt.pages.getById('tools').getUrl() }}){% endif %} * `auth`: [{{ pt.pages.getById('config-passwords').getTitle() }}]({{ pt.pages.getById('config-passwords').getUrl() }}) * `assets`: [{{ pt.pages.getById('assets').getTitle() }}]({{ pt.pages.getById('assets').getUrl() }}) * `files`: [{{ pt.pages.getById('assets-files').getTitle() }}]({{ pt.pages.getById('assets-files').getUrl() }}) * `user`: [{{ pt.pages.getById('users').getTitle() }}]({{ pt.pages.getById('users').getUrl() }}) {% endset %}
